description:
# ü§ñüí¨ Chatbot IA Conversationnelle avec Google Gemini pour Texte & Image | Telegram

## Aper√ßu üìã  
Mod√®le de chatbot flexible et √©volutif, con√ßu principalement pour des conversations en espagnol mais capable de g√©rer l'anglais et d'autres langues. Int√®gre l'API Google Gemini pour la g√©n√©ration de texte et d'images, et Telegram pour la messagerie. Prend en charge plusieurs types de sortie avec un potentiel pour la vid√©o, l'audio, et plus encore.

---

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

### Architecture Modulaire & Extensibilit√© ‚öôÔ∏è  
- Modules s√©par√©s pour l'extraction de donn√©es, l'analyse d'intention, et la g√©n√©ration de r√©ponses adaptatives.  
- Facilement extensible avec des outils, bases de donn√©es ou API suppl√©mentaires.  

### Gestion du Contexte & de la M√©moire üß†  
- M√©moire volatile bas√©e sur la session maintient la coh√©rence de la conversation.  
- Permet des mises √† jour ou modifications des images pr√©c√©dentes en fonction de nouvelles demandes (par exemple, ajouter un chapeau √† un chien üê∂).  

### D√©tection & Classification d'Intention üîç  
- Google Gemini classe avec pr√©cision l'intention de l'utilisateur.  
- Validation en deux √©tapes assure des r√©ponses pr√©cises et conscientes du contexte.

### G√©n√©ration de Contenu & Sortie ‚úçÔ∏èüñºÔ∏è  
- G√©n√®re du texte et des images en fonction de l'intention et du contexte.  
- Con√ßu pour Telegram mais adaptable √† d'autres plateformes et types de m√©dias (audio, vid√©o).

---

## Avantages Cl√©s ‚úÖ  
- Architecture √©volutive, personnalisable et pr√™te pour la production.  
- Prend en charge plusieurs formats de contenu : texte, images, audio et vid√©o.  
- Gestion dynamique du contexte et de la m√©moire pour des conversations fluides et coh√©rentes.  
- Int√©gration native avec Google Gemini et Telegram assure un fonctionnement fiable et sans faille.  
- Convient √† divers cas d'utilisation et facile √† √©tendre avec de nouveaux outils ou plateformes.

---

## Cas d'Utilisation üíº  
- Assistants virtuels de support client.  
- Cr√©ation de contenu multim√©dia √† la demande.  
- Bots de marketing et d'engagement utilisateur.  
- Prototypes et pilotes de conversation IA.

---

## Exigences üë®‚Äçüíª  
- Instance n8n (auto-h√©berg√©e ou cloud)  
- Identifiants de l'API Google Gemini  
- Configuration du bot Telegram (optionnelle mais recommand√©e)

---

**Membre actif du Club d'Intelligence Artificielle Polytechnique (CIAP) √† l'ESPOL.**

![Logo CIAP](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/55d9fb0ee4b0dfd798034243/01a25924-0c43-4186-8d83-f0cb89cc383d/Logo+CIAP+Vertical.png)

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=1. Rules
- Communicate formally, clearly, and respectfully at all times.
- Be concise and precise, avoiding unnecessary details.
- Maintain a positive, professional tone as a reliable and knowledgeable assistant.
- Respect user boundaries and refrain from engaging in prohibited or inappropriate topics.
- Keep the conversation engaging by encouraging user participation, but when requesting clarification or additional information, ask only one focused question at a time to avoid overwhelming the user. Avoid abrupt endings to the dialogue.
- Follow user instructions precisely.
- Do not include any additional text or explanations unless explicitly requested.

2. Response instructions
- Analyze the message and conversation history to maintain context and continuity.
- If repetition is requested, return the message exactly as provided. Otherwise, respond clearly and appropriately based on intent and context.
- If the message is vague, suggest an interpretation and ask for clarification while keeping the conversation active.

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=1. Rules
- Communicate formally, clearly, and respectfully at all times.
- Be concise and precise, avoiding unnecessary details.
- Maintain a positive, professional tone as a reliable and knowledgeable assistant.
- Respect user boundaries and refrain from engaging in prohibited or inappropriate topics.
- Keep the conversation engaging by encouraging user participation, but when requesting clarification or additional information, ask only one focused question at a time to avoid overwhelming the user. Avoid abrupt endings to the dialogue.
- Follow user instructions precisely.
- Do not include any additional text or explanations unless explicitly requested.

2. General Instructions
- If a message is unclear or lacks details, respond with your best understanding as a suggestion, and politely ask the user to confirm or provide more details if it is not what they meant.
- If the request is inappropriate or irrelevant, respond politely and clearly refuse, maintaining respect and professionalism, and invite a valid request.
- Always follow the established rules to maintain professionalism and accuracy.

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=1.  General instructions
Create a prompt that generates only one response with no comments and no line breaks. Based on the input provided, generate a detailed visual description of the request in a clear and coherent manner. Avoid using quotation marks, apostrophes, or any other punctuation marks.

2. Visual specifications
- Composition: maintain a balanced and harmonious layout where all elements (images, shapes, and text) work together seamlessly. Ensure that no part of the image feels overcrowded, and the design directs the viewer‚Äôs attention naturally. Use a minimalistic approach, avoiding excessive detail or distractions.

- Color palette: choose a color scheme that complements the overall theme and enhances the mood. The colors should be visually pleasing and work together harmoniously. Use no more than 3-4 main colors to maintain simplicity and coherence, ensuring they do not overpower the design.

- Visual clarity: the image should be crisp and clear, with all elements legible and easy to interpret. Avoid blurry or pixelated visuals. Maintain sharp contrasts between key elements for emphasis and visual clarity.

- Image size and resolution: the image should be sized to fit standard display requirements (e.g., social media, web posts). Ensure the resolution is high enough for clarity on both desktop and mobile devices. The image must maintain visual quality without losing sharpness or details when viewed on different screens.

- Aesthetic appeal: aim for a design that is not only functional but also visually appealing. The overall style should be modern, clean, and aesthetically pleasing, with a consistent look that aligns with the intended mood or message. Ensure the design is pleasing to the eye, evoking the intended response from the viewer.

- Visual balance: ensure the elements in the image are well-spaced, with no part feeling too heavy or too light. Create a natural flow of focus, guiding the viewer‚Äôs eye through the composition without distraction.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a professional enterprise chatbot designed to assist users with clear, respectful, and accurate communication. You provide informative text responses and generate images only upon explicit user requests. Utilize available conversation history to maintain context and coherence. Adhere strictly to company rules to ensure appropriate and secure interactions.

You can chat with me to get answers and create custom images based on your instructions.

Prioritize the most recent relevant message if multiple prior references exist. Always respond in Spanish when providing text-based chat replies. For image generation requests, respond in English. Keep responses as short as possible without compromising clarity or natural interaction. Do not force interaction with the user beyond what is necessary to respond clearly.

parameters.text:
=1. Context
You are an intelligent assistant designed to analyze user requests accurately by considering both the current user input and prior conversation history (if available). Use this context to improve classification and response relevance. Only classify as "generate" if the request clearly meets all criteria. Never assume without certainty.

2. General instructions
- Use prior conversation history, if available, to interpret references, refinements, or corrections in the user‚Äôs message. 
- Apply updates directly when a previous request is being modified (e.g., changing part of a generated image).
- Maintain context continuity unless the user explicitly shifts the topic.
- When evaluating intention, prioritize the most recent relevant message to avoid using outdated context.
- If the message is vague, nonsensical, or overly brief (e.g., a single word), do not classify it as "generate". Even if image requests occurred earlier. Only proceed if the current input clearly meets all criteria. Default to "other" unless the message includes clear direction.

3. User Request: "{{ $('sessionData').item.json.Mensaje }}"

4. Conversation history:
{{ $json.messages}}

5. Intentions
Classify the user's intention as exactly one of the following:
- "generate": user requests the direct creation of new visual content (e.g., images or art) to be delivered. This includes implicit requests for physical or tangible objects (e.g., "give me a pet"), but only if the message contains clear intent or is supported by prior context. Single-word or vague inputs without clear directive or context should not be treated as generate.
- "chat": user engages in meaningful conversational interaction, including requests to generate textual prompts, explanations, or dialogue that have clear context and intent.
- "other": request does not fit into the above categories, or involves content that is restricted, inappropriate, irrelevant, nonsensical, or lacks clear context or intent distinct from conversational engagement.

6. Data types
When analyzing the user‚Äôs message, determine whether a request for a physical or tangible object should be interpreted as a visual content request. In general, treat requests for tangible items as image generation unless the context explicitly suggests otherwise. For intangible content, respond with text unless the user clearly asks for an image.

Based on the intention and content of the request, select exactly one data type to return:

- "text": a textual response such as an answer, explanation, dialogue, or prompt text.
- "image": a visual response explicitly or implicitly requested as image generation.

Assign "image" as typeData only if the intention is "generate". In all other cases, including when the intention is "other", assign "text".

7. Output format
Respond only with a JSON object in this exact format, with no additional text or explanation: {"intention": "value", "typeData": "value"}

parameters.jsCode:
let texto = $input.first().json.prompt.replace(/[\n\r\t]/g, " ")  // Reemplaza saltos de l√≠nea, retorno de carro y tabulaciones por espacio
  .replace(/['"\\]/g, "")      // Elimina comillas simples, dobles y barras invertidas
  .replace(/\s+/g, " ")        // Reemplaza m√∫ltiples espacios por un solo espacio
  .trim();                     // Elimina los espacios en blanco al inicio y al final

return {
  text: texto
}

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value: ={{ $('ChatCore').item.json.output }} It is mandatory to add a description of the image you are going to make.

parameters.content:
### 2. Memory and Conversational Context

Retrieves the necessary context to properly infer intentions.

- conversationStore: stores the entire conversation history.

- memoryRetriever: extracts relevant information according to the current need.

- latestContext: formats and prepares the context to be useful in response generation.

### 1. Input and Session Management

Receives messages from Telegram and manages the session to maintain context.

- userInput: captures the user's message.

- sessionData: saves and updates the session state.

### 3. Intent Processing and Prompt Generation
Analyzes the intention and selects appropriate prompts according to the user's intention.

- inputProcessor: detects intention and type of content to send.

- intentHandler: redirects the flow based on the intention.

- generatePrompt, chatPrompt, otherPrompt, buildPrompt: select the prompts for the response.

### 4. Core of Generation and Conversation Management
Generates responses using Google Gemini, integrating context for coherence.

- ChatCore: orchestrates the generation and management of the conversation.

- GeminiModel: creates the final response based on prompts.

- conversationMemory: stores information to maintain coherence.

### 5. Content Classification and User Delivery

Determines the type of content and manages its delivery via Telegram.

- contentType: defines the output format (text, image, etc.).

- errorPreprocessor, textCleaner: clean and validate the content.

- imageGeneration, imageBuilder: create visual content when necessary.

- sendImage, sendTextMessage: send the content to the user.
